name: Scroll To
description: Always center the view on this object, or at the mid-point of multiple objects.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.name: Shake
actions.description: Shake the screen for a duration of time.

params.name: Magnitude
params.description: The strength of the shake, in maximum pixels to scroll away.

params.name: Duration
params.description: The time the shake should last, in seconds.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Select whether the magnitude gradually reduces to zero over the duration, or stays constant.

params.name: State
params.description: Whether to enable or disable the behavior.
